page.title: 17A day in the life
page.content: {(Wednesday)}At 8.30am my friend calls for me and we walk to the swimming pool.We arrive at about 8.55am. The swimming lesson lasts for half an hour, then we go to school on a coach. At school we read until break. Up till lunch break we do Maths or English. Then we have our lunch. After lunch we do project work, that's the first lesson. For the second, and final, lesson we write a story or do art, for art and story we are sometimes given a subject. Then we go home. For the rest of the day we can do what we like. Here are some of the things we do after school: Play with friends, watch television, go riding bicycles or rollerskating, and do hobbies. { } { }
